languages.text: "Продавец запчастей из дока Т-4095 зачастил с грязными поставками — половина документации подложная. Думаю, он выведет нас на синдикат Красного Мученика, надо только подтолкнуть".
"The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."
languages.original_text: "Продавец запчастей из дока Т-4095 зачастил с грязными поставками — половина документации подложная. Думаю, он выведет нас на синдикат Красного Мученика, надо только подтолкнуть".

traits.locale_text: "The spare-parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate. He just needs a nudge."
"The spare-parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate. He just needs a nudge."

"The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

languages.text: "Der Ersatzteilhändler in Dock T-4095 führt illegale Lieferungen durch. Die Hälfte seiner Papiere ist gefälscht. Ich denke, er wird uns zum Syndikat des Roten Märtyrers führen – er braucht nur einen Anreiz."
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ersatzteilhändler in Dock T-4095 führt illegale Lieferungen durch. Die Hälfte seiner Papiere ist gefälscht. Ich denke, er wird uns zum Syndikat des Roten Märtyrers führen – er braucht nur einen Anreiz."

languages.text: « Le vendeur de pièces détachées du quai T-4095 n'arrête pas de recevoir des cargaisons illicites. La moitié de ses papiers sont des faux. Je pense qu'il ne faudra pas grand-chose pour le convaincre de nous mener au syndicat du Martyr Rouge. »
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: « Le vendeur de pièces détachées du quai T-4095 n'arrête pas de recevoir des cargaisons illicites. La moitié de ses papiers sont des faux. Je pense qu'il ne faudra pas grand-chose pour le convaincre de nous mener au syndicat du Martyr Rouge. »

languages.text: “T-4095号码头的备件商人涉嫌非法运输，一半的文件都是伪造的。我敢说，他肯定能带我们找到‘赤色烈士’犯罪团伙的窝点，只要稍微推他一把就可以了。”
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: “T-4095号码头的备件商人涉嫌非法运输，一半的文件都是伪造的。我敢说，他肯定能带我们找到‘赤色烈士’犯罪团伙的窝点，只要稍微推他一把就可以了。”

languages.text: «El comerciante de piezas de repuesto del muelle T-4095 lleva una racha de envíos ilícitos. La mitad de su papeleo está falsificado. Creo que puede llevarnos hasta el sindicato del Mártir Rojo; solo necesita un empujón».
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: «El comerciante de piezas de repuesto del muelle T-4095 lleva una racha de envíos ilícitos. La mitad de su papeleo está falsificado. Creo que puede llevarnos hasta el sindicato del Mártir Rojo; solo necesita un empujón».

languages.text: 「ドックT-4095の予備部品屋は、違法な積み荷の取引に手を染めてます。書類の半分は偽物です。あいつを少しつつけば『赤の殉教者』のシンジケートに辿り着くはずです」
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: 「ドックT-4095の予備部品屋は、違法な積み荷の取引に手を染めてます。書類の半分は偽物です。あいつを少しつつけば『赤の殉教者』のシンジケートに辿り着くはずです」

languages.text: "T-4095 Rıhtımı'ndaki yedek parça tüccarı, kanunsuz sevkiyat işini iyice azdırmış. Evrakların yarısı düzmece. Hafif bir dürtersek Kızıl Şehit örgütüne kadar izini süreriz zannımca."
languages.original_text: "The spare parts merchant in Dock T-4095 is on an illicit shipment spree. Half of his paperwork is fake. I think he will lead us to the Red Martyr's syndicate — he just needs a nudge."

traits.locale_text: "T-4095 Rıhtımı'ndaki yedek parça tüccarı, kanunsuz sevkiyat işini iyice azdırmış. Evrakların yarısı düzmece. Hafif bir dürtersek Kızıl Şehitler örgütüne kadar izini süreriz zannımca."
